title: Ohitorisama Ni Wa Naremashita No De. Konyakusha Houchi-Chuu!
alternative_title: おひとり様には慣れましたので。婚約者放置中！ ; Ohitorisama ni wa Naremashita no de. Konyakusha Houchichuu! ; Since I've Gotten Used to Being Alone, I'm Ignoring My Fiancé! ; 已經習慣一個人了。訂婚對象放置中！ ; 已经习惯一个人了。订婚对象放置中！
status: おひとり様には慣れましたので。婚約者放置中！ ; Ohitorisama ni wa Naremashita no de. Konyakusha Houchichuu! ; Since I've Gotten Used to Being Alone, I'm Ignoring My Fiancé! ; 已經習慣一個人了。訂婚對象放置中！ ; 已经习惯一个人了。订婚对象放置中！
description:
Description :
        Countess Nicole's fiancé, Chaos, is always by his childhood friend, Princess Caroline's side. As a result of being constantly neglected by Chaos, Nicole has awakened to the idea of ​​being alone, thinking, "If that's what he likes, then I should do what I like too!"...? While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? The long-awaited comic adaptation of the slapstick love comedy of Chaos and Nicole, whose mutual unrequited love has become complicated!
